title: How is 2020 different from the rest of the years so far? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here see - Corona virus spread and lockdown . And india exports HCQ medicine + mission sagar and vandebharat abhiyanIndia got observer status in Indian Ocean Commision .America China trade war . And cyber attack in Australia and also issue with chinaChina introduced a bill to change the status of Hongkong which was transferred in 1997 by BritainIndia China Galwan valley dispute .Continuous earthquakes in India .The economic recession all over the world.Nepal government issued new map related to kalapani .Olympics date extended.India's highest foreign exchange reserve and crossed 500 billion dollarCyclones Amphan , nisharg and extratropical cyclone manggaNepotism issue in bollywood Vs constitution a debateNASA's human space mission “spacex” using falcon9 rockectAgriculture sector growth rate crossed 5% in indiaLabours laws issue in indiaVirtual meeting of NAM .Oil price sharply down in international market .India Australia deal to use their army baseLonar crator lake turned its colour to pinkJim corbett became first to provide quarantine facility to animals.Increase in population of Asiatic lion in Gujarat .I think it's more than sufficient to prove how 2020 is diffrent from rest of the years

It's different from rest of year becoz. You can see such pandemic which has not medicine yet And natural disasters are playing major role . Climate are changing and you can how humans are lusty greedy etc. (Elephant case in India:- one mother elephant carrying child in her womb was died becoz of some people gave pineapple in in which bomb was attached. And bomb exploded she died. See how humans are behaving with animals . Animals are the best gift from nature but we are destroying their life for our comfort . We are also animals (social) but we evolve and thinking we are dominant .which sign of destruction of nature. This year is full of shitty news and experience. Hope rest months have some good news
